text: The Algeria national under-15 football team is the national under-15 football team of Algeria and is controlled by the Algerian Football Federation. The team competes in the UNAF U-15 Tournament. ==Honours== *UNAF U-15 Tournament: :Runners-up (3): Apr 2018, Nov 2018, 2019 ==Tournament Records== ===Youth Olympic Games record=== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !colspan=9|Youth Olympic Games |- !colspan=9|Appearances: 0 |- !Year !Round !Position ! ! ! ! ! ! |- | 2010||colspan=8 rowspan=2|Did not enter |- | 2014 |- | 2018||colspan=8 rowspan=2|No tournament |- | 2022 |- !Total|| ||0/2|| || || || || || |} ===UNAF U-15 Tournament record=== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !colspan=9|UNAF U-15 Tournament |- !colspan=9|Appearances: 4 |- !Year !Round !Position ! ! ! ! ! ! |-bgcolor=#9acdff | 2017||Fourth place||4th||3||0||2||1||3||5 |-bgcolor=silver |style="border: 3px solid red"| 2018||Runners-up||2nd||2||1||1||0||3||2 |-bgcolor=silver | 2018||Runners-up||2nd||3||1||1||1||7||5 |-bgcolor=silver |style="border: 3px solid red"| 2019||Runners-up||2nd||3||2||0||1||7||2 |- !Total||Runners-up||4/4||11||4||4||3||20||14 |} == References == == External links == * Algerian Football Association - Official site Category:African national under-15 association football teams under-15 Category:Youth football in Algeria
